content: @Lloyd McKenzie I believe we agreed in FMG that the IDMP resources would get some kind of status notice, but this has not happened yet?
Did we agree on the text of the notice?
I'm not sure that we did. BR&R was supposed to do it?
I propose a variant of the warning here: build.fhir.org/iteminstance.html:
This resource is still undergoing development and review by the appropriate Workgroups. At this time, is considered only as a draft resource proposal not suitable for implementation
I'm pretty sure BR&R is not going to be happy with that, but agree it's FMG position.
is ItemInstance in the right category on the resource list page?
ok. I want to split entities into 2, to use less vertical space, and use the 5th column. suggestions?
Posted in the wrong stream. ItemInstance was approved to be dropped from the publication by OO on Nov. 15
We could separate Entities into Physical Entities and Other Entities. (Latter holding the first 3)
